word:
Chap. 31 - Diary Entries

                                                        MS - 19 - 1889 

                             Diary - March 1889 


                  [Battle Creek,] Sabbath, March 2, 1889 
     Spoke in the tabernacle in the forenoon from Revelation 3. I urged upon the people the necessity of religion in their homes, and of educating and training their children to have well balanced characters that the Lord can approve.
